newsitem.title: UK: OPEC basket price $23.61 on Wednesday.
newsitem.headline: OPEC basket price $23.61 on Wednesday.

text.p: The price of OPEC's basket of seven crudes was $23.61 per barrel on Wednesday against $23.91 on Tuesday, the OPECNA news agency said, quoting the OPEC secretariat.
The basket comprises Algeria's Saharan Blend, Indonesia's Minas, Nigeria's Bonny Light, Saudi Arabia's Arabian Light, Dubai of the UAE, Venezuela's Tia Juana and Mexico's Isthmus.
